Description: Ostracon, fragment of the upper-body of a red-brown pottery grooved vessel, the fabric is grey black in section, the exterior is covered with a self-slip, faint traces of a red-painted text and of incised decoration.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (394277) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/394277)
